programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep36
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Confounding Concoction of the Crooked Combotato - A fierce game of plot potato takes an unexpected twist when Melvin unleashes one of his most fiendish -- and carb-loaded -- creations yet.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep24
programme.desc: House of Flying Pandas - The gang learns of even bigger and direr forces working against the Empress and the Kingdom of China, and must come up with a plan to put a stop to it before it is too late.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep25
programme.desc: Coronation of the Iron Goddess - When things don't quite go according to plan, Po and the Kids must rally with other allies to save the Empress and protect China.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep18
programme.desc: Coop, Where's My Guy? / Fluffleberry Quest - When Cooper loses Guy Diamond in Troll Forest, Poppy and Branch accompany him as he retraces his steps /Poppy sets out to recreate the recipe of Branch's favorite dessert at any cost

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep18
programme.desc: Verry Berry Gets It Together/Fur Mountain - When Verry Berry's adventurous spirit gets her in trouble, she joins up with a colony of army ants to learn discipline. / When Twig disappears into the coat of a dog and cohabitates with a bunch of fleas, the Mighty Ones must convince him that fleas are not his friends.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep31
programme.desc: Swords Man - Jealousy overtakes Puss when he suddenly feels like the third wheel after the Goodsword has an instant connection to El Guante Blanco.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep17
programme.desc: Rupert and the Giant Sunflower - Rupert is very excited. Mother Nature has given him a special elixir to help his sunflower seeds grow but there's a big surprise to come.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep18
programme.desc: Rupert and the Cuckoo Clock - When Mum's cuckoo clock breaks time stops and Ping Pong, Ming, Edward and Bill freeze in time. Rupert and the Fox Twins have to find a way to get time ticking again

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep19
programme.desc: Rupert and the Magic Books - When Ping Pong says she is too busy to join a story reading day Raggety magically brings the books to life and they fly to Ping Pong's Pagoda, where they start to tell her their stories.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep20
programme.desc: Rupert and the Mischievous Genie - Rupert, Ping Pong, Bill, Edward and Raggety find some magical, musical stepping stones deep in the woods and unwittingly unleash a naughty young genie bent on making mischief.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep17
programme.desc: When Will The Water Come Back? - Jess is concerned that all the water on the farm is frozen and sets about working out when it will come back. He works out that once the sun is out the ice melts and learns all about freezing and melting..

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep18
programme.desc: How Can We Paint The Lilly Pad Green? - Mimi is trying to prepare for a visit from Horace and wants the hutch to feel like home for her froggy friend. Jess promises to paint the special seat Mimi has made for Horace green for her, but first he has to work out how to make green from different colours.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep19
programme.desc: Where's My Feather Gone? - Jess thinks that Little Bird has dropped a feather as a gift for him to keep and play with so he's very worried when it goes missing. He searches for it and finally he finds it, right in Little Bird's nest, keeping her warm.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep20
programme.desc: Where Have All The Stars Gone? - Jess is having a sleepover and wants to wish on a star with the puppies like Willow has told them to. But they all fall asleep. When he wakes in the morning to find the stars are gone he has to work out why and when they'll be back

programme.title: Olivia Ep33
programme.desc: Olivia Explores The Attic - Olivia searches high and low for Grandma's missing time capsule, and eventually finds it tucked away, forgotten, in the attic. Olivia is puzzled and thrilled by the objects that she finds from Grandmother's childhood, and is inspired to create her own time capsule.

programme.title: Olivia Ep34
programme.desc: Olivia's Good Luck - Olivia is determined to sell more Young Pioneers cookies than anybody else in her troupe especially Francine. It turns out to be harder than she thought it would be, but with a little perseverance and ingenuity, Olivia manages to do her personal best.

programme.title: Olivia Ep35
programme.desc: Olivia Runs A Carnival - When Mrs. Hogenmuller's class plans a Parents' Night, Olivia thrills her classmates when she suggests the idea of a carnival. In her own special way Olivia oversees the construction of games and amusements, and when the night of the carnival arrives, she still has a few surprises up her sleeve.

programme.title: Olivia Ep36
programme.desc: Olivia Makes Magic - After seeing Grandma perform an impromptu magic show, Olivia begins practicing her own magic tricks. She doesn't have much success, until she manages to make herself disappear for Ian and Julian. They can't figure out how she's done it, but Ian doesn't care. He just wants his big sister back!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep17
programme.desc: Why Crocodile Has A Bumpy Back - You see there was a time when Crocodile didn't have a bumpy back. His skin was all smooth and he had to be very careful of the hot Tinga Tinga sun. One day whilst napping Crocodile gets very sunburnt and falls into a deep sleep. Lion warns all the animals to be on their guard as the Wildebeest have returned to Tinga Tinga and they could stampede at any moment. Crocodile misses the meeting, snoring under the hot sun. The animals try to warn snappy Crocodile but it's too late and the Wildebeest stampede! OOOoof! . All over Crocodile. From that day on Crocodile has a bumpy back and is grumpier and snappier than ever! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep18
programme.desc: Why Jackal Howls At The Moon - You see there was a time when Jackal didn't howl at the moon. He was a trickster and he always wanted what was not rightfully his. Jackal took over Hen's nest and Aardvark's burrow. He even took the cub's supper from Mama Cheetah! Enough was enough! All the animals decide to teach Jackal a lesson and make him believe that the Moon is made of the sweetest, most delicious honey in Tinga Tinga. Of course, Jackal instantly wants some but it never comes. From that day on Jackal howls up at the moon, waiting for another drop of delicious MOOoooon honey! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep19
programme.desc: Why Hare Hops - You see there was a time when Hare didn't hop. He was one of the speediest animals in Tinga Tinga but none of the other animals wanted to race with him because Hare always won and it was becoming boring. Then one day, slow but clever Tortoise decides to challenge Hare. Hare can't believe his luck, but Tortoise wins and he wins and he wins! When Hare realizes that it's not such fun being on the losing end, Tortoise finally lets Hare hop past the finishing line in first place! Well it's not good to win all the time. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep20
programme.desc: Why Mosquito Buzzes - You see there was time when Mosquito didn't buzz. Mosquito was as quiet as quiet can be and did she like to tell tales. One day Mosquito tells the Monkeys that the sun looks very low in the sky. Maybe it's sad and doesn't want to rise!' worry the Monkeys. Mosquito flits off to spread the news - The sun is never going to rise again!' soon the whole of Tinga Tinga is in complete panic The Sun is never going to rise again!' Of course, the sun does rise again and all is right again in Tinga Tinga. But the animals decide to tie a grass around Mosquito's tail. From that day on Mosquito buzzes and everyone can swot her away rather than listen to her gossipy tales. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep5
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Terrifying Perilous Misfortune of the T.P. Mummy - After George and Harold T.P. the entire school with toilet paper, they are forced to flush it all down the toilet causing a giant explosion that turns the French teacher into the T.P. Mummy

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep6
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Squishy Predicament of Stanley Peet's Stinky Pits - When George and Harold want to win the school Avocadgrow contest, they accidentally turn their science teacher into a giant avocado monster

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep41
programme.desc: Game Plan - Boss tries to rename the local soccer team to "The Babies", but after Danny gets involved in the popularity race with his name, "The Hot Dogs", the town becomes divided. Boss creates a crack team of Baby Corp employees to game plan solutions to the worst outcomes.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep42
programme.desc: Night Owls - Boss arranges a sleepover with Quiet Psycho Baby to get access to her father the Mayor's day planner, hoping to plant his own pro-baby agenda. However, staying up all night has the unexpected consequence of delusional over-tiredness! Tim sneaks into an art film and decides he has to be a grown-up now, so Mom and Dad try to "kid" him up again.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep4
programme.desc: The Legend of Master Long-Tooth - Po and Blade must convince a deceased comic book writer's son to give them information about an unreleased comic that may point them toward the next weapon: a whip of fire. However, after the events of 103 Po is now a wanted criminal, so the Emperor's Forbidden Company arrives and captures him. Torn between saving Po and the mission she's sworn to complete, Blade flees and abandons Po.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep2
programme.desc: Two Party System / Fun Branch - Poppy discovers that Branch and Bridgets birthdays are on the same day and throws them both partiesBranch attempts to prove to the Snack Pack that he is fun.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep67
programme.desc: Save The Cat - The search continues as Puss, Dulcinea, Artephius and Toby must complete task after task to gather the San Lorenzans and defeat the thieves who have a dangerous plan for the

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep16
programme.desc: Grug Vs Math / Footless - Amber announces that math is the new skill that every hunter must have. Grug cannot seems to grasp the concept and enlists Squawk to help him/Grug and Snoot ban dancing when it causes a rock slide. Eep sets up an underground dance club against the adults' wishes.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep2
programme.desc: A Day in Turkey - Wally and Wenda go to Turkey to find a sleeping rug for Arf. They meet a fellow Wanderer, Yasemin, and realize that their Turkish rug is actually a map to the Doubling Key! Odlulu and Fritz find the key first and cause chaos as the W's try to escape from the underground Cistern.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep20
programme.desc: Hocus Pocus / Furricane - When Tag and Scooch get a once-in-a-lifetime chance to learn magic from Muttfield, Tag cannot wait to be the star of the end-of-class show. When Scooch outshines Tag with his natural gift for magic, Tag gets jealous and attempts a master level trick that goes awry. \ The dogs are shedding their winter coats and it's the day of the big Pawston Picnic. But when Spike alerts the Barkers that there's an incoming windstorm, it's up to Spike and Tag chase the storm while the Barkers try to convince the dogs of Pawston to go inside!

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep15
programme.desc: Rodney J. Dinkle, Babysitter / Lights Out - When accident-prone Rodney gets hired to babysit a mischievous toddler, TZG secretly watches over their safety. / When theres a power outage in Harmony Harbor, TZG secretly helps the townsfolk beat the blackout.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep3
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Flying Shark - Julian is very excited about the Sealife Awareness Day at Greendale School. While he's talking to Pat about it, his dad gets a call from Ben - a special delivery! Pat discovers it's a giant inflatable shark which is to be the surprise centrepiece of the Sealife day. But when Pat stops to help Alf mend a gate, a mix-up with parcel tape ends up with the whale accidentally inflating and floating off... Pat must use his ingenuity to catch the whale and - most important of all - deliver it in time for the special Sealife Awareness event...

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep4
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Blue Flash - Pat must deliver Ben to Greendale School, dressed as superhero, The Blue Flash. But Ben keeps stopping to help people on the way and his costume gets increasingly ruined! Meanwhile at the school, Julian can't wait to meet his hero but Sarah Gilbertson insists that The Blue Flash isn't real... At last Pat arrives at the school with Ben wearing a new costume hastily cobbled together by Pat. Julian isn't fooled. Looks like The Blue Flash isn't real after all... But then Pat tells the kids how Ben helped people on the way and they realise he is a REAL superhero!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep15
programme.desc: Double Finked - Magnus's nephew, Axel, arrives on the island and tells the Rescue Riders that he wants to join their team. But is he just a trickster like his uncle?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Paddington and The House Guest / Paddington and The Banana - Mr. Curry is invited by Paddington to stay with the Browns whilst his flooded house is being repaired. He thinks the Browns are too disorganized. // Paddington accidentally takes a banana from the caf without paying for it.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep104
programme.desc: S'Mores - Tiny Chef makes S'Mores for a campout and overcomes his fear of the dark with help from his friends.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep512
programme.desc: Pups Save the Snowshoeing Goodways / Pups Save a Duck Pond - When Mayor Goodway and the twins are late getting back from a snowshoeing, Jake and Everest call the Paw Patrol to search for them. // Water in the duck pond mysteriously drains out, it's up to the PAW Patrol find out what's happening!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep515
programme.desc: Rocky Saves Himself / Pups and the Mystery of the Driverless Snocat - Rocky must rescue himself when he has been stranded on an Island full of trash by Humdinger. // Daring Danny's new remote control accidentally takes control of Everest's SnoCat and all the vehicles in Adventure Bay!

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep110
programme.desc: New Squid on the Block / Boss Bissy / To BFF or Not to BFF - When a new kid starts at school, Bossy does everything to make sure they have a good time. // Bossy wishes he was older like his big sister. // Bossy and Turtle fail to get a perfect score on a bestie quiz.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep122
programme.desc: The Lost Jelly / Coral Dilemma - When a visitor blows into Carnivore Cove, Baby's communication skills are put to the test. // When Vigo steals the color from the coral in Carnivore Cove, it's up to Super Shark and Captain Kelp to bring it back!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: A Tail Of Two Fathers / The Welcome Wagon - It's a battle of the dads when Grandpa and Daddy can't agree on the best way to camp. // When Baby's new neighbor doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep224
programme.desc: Sky Pirates Pt 1 - Our crew works together to help a knight find his sword. For helping him, they get the last Medallion and are shown a map to a sky land! El Bravo sprouts wings and takes them to Celestia where a Queen enlists their help stopping a band of jesters.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Peek-A-BOO! - When Santiago and the crew are put in charge of babysitting a pet gargoyle, things go awry when the gargoyle gets loose.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep515
programme.desc: Captain Daddy Dog - Mummy Dog and Danny are very excited! Captain Daddy Dog is home from the sea, and he's bearing gifts! What can they be?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep506
programme.desc: Mr Fox's Shop - Peppa and George visit Mr Fox's Shop to buy Granny and Grandpa an anniversary present, but what will they choose?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep516
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Dinosaur Park - To celebrate Freddy Fox's birthday, the children go on a trip to a Dinosaur Park. With Grampy Rabbit as their leader, they follow dinosaur footprints to find Freddy's birthday treat.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep517
programme.desc: Bedtime Story - Daddy Pig reads Peppa and George a bedtime story. Later George wakes up again, so Peppa has to make up another story.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep518
programme.desc: Lost Keys - After a family trip to a mountain beauty spot, Daddy Pig loses the car keys down a very deep drain.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep519
programme.desc: George's New Dinosaur - When his favorite toy dinosaur loses its tail, George visits Mr Fox's Shop to find a new one.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep115
programme.desc: The Fuchsia Ocean / Zero Waste - Chemical sprays are making the countryside rosy! The Barbapapas' build an aviary to protect sick birds. // When they see a beach covered with rubbish, the Barbapapa family decides to clean the beach and use the trash to make a miniature golf course.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep619
programme.desc: Snow Rescue Blaze - When a big ski mishap gets Crusher and Pickle stuck super far away, Blaze and AJ will perform a daring snow rescue to save the day.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep620
programme.desc: Megabot! - Blaze and AJ help their amazing new friend Megabot get to Axle City in time for the big Robot Parade

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Pups Save an Adventure / Pups Save a Surprise - While camping, Marshall and the PAW Patrol help Alex learn about Fire Safety! // It seems like a regular day in Adventure Bay as the Paw Patrol is called to duty. But the pups are in for a surprise - PAW Patrol Appreciation Day!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Pups Save the Mayor's Race / Pups Save an Outlaw's Loot - Its the annual Mayors Race, and Mayor Humdinger is planning his most devious cheating scheme yet. // When Ryder comes across a map for buried treasure, Mayor Humdinger snatches the map and runs off to find the loot for himself.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Call Me Billiam / The Finship Trap - When Rayna asks William to be more responsible, he sets out to become a grownup fishy named Billiam. // When Baby discovers Hank and Goldie aren't speaking to each other, he concocts an elaborate plan to bring them back together.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Baby Tooth - When Baby Shark loses his tooth for real, he and William team up with an unexpected ally to track it down.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep305
programme.desc: Paddington Meets Paddingtron/Paddington's First Diwali - Paddington builds a robot called PaddingTron that requires a real friend to work. // Baaz invites everyone to celebrate Diwali with him and Paddington is his helpful assistant, but will they both get to enjoy the fireworks finale?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep306
programme.desc: Paddington and the Solar Eclipse/Paddington and the Mysterious Inventor - Paddington has a race against time in order to enjoy his first ever solar eclipse. // Paddington accepts an inventor's award for Simi when she's too shy to step up, but why does she then feel jealous and sad?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Magenta's Case of the Giggles - Josh and Blue are pretending to be doctors around the house, giving silly checkups to friends, but one 'patient' seems to have a curious condition. We'll play Blue's Clues to help find the cure!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Bridge - Rubble and his construction pup family gear up to build a bridge, only to find the villainous Speed Meister has a different idea. It's up to Rubble & Crew to work together and save the day by building a new, safe bridge to Builder Cove.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Double Trouble / Box Not So Clever - In order to win the Citizen of the Year, Sir Steel and Professor Scratch create holograms doubles of Deer Squad who cause chaos all around. // It's Recycling Day and Sir Steel puts the whole town in cardboard boxes with his Box-ooka device.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep224
programme.desc: Sky Pirates Pt 1 - Our crew works together to help a knight find his sword. For helping him, they get the last Medallion and are shown a map to a sky land! El Bravo sprouts wings and takes them to Celestia where a Queen enlists their help stopping a band of jesters.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Shark Prank / Lagoon Lemonade - Baby and William have to think outside the box in order to prank the ultimate prank master... Grandma Shark. // When a heatwave strikes, Baby and William supply the town with Grandpa's world famous Lemonade.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Missing Falcon / Happy Bestie-versary / The Tumminator - Bossy and Turtle go full gumshoe to find Bissy's missing plushy. // Bossy and Turtle decide to exchange gifts for their first annual friendship anniversary. // Bossy and Turtle have to face the scariest ride ever at Wacky Wacky World: The Tumminator!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep221
programme.desc: Pups Save Walinda / Pups Save a Big Bone - The PAW Patrol plan a special celebration for Wally the Walrus. When he doesn't show up, they find he has a special new friend named Walinda! // During Capn Turbot's archaeological dig, a rock slide unearths a big dinosaur bone!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep822
programme.desc: Pups Save the Kitties and the Kiddies - Mayor Humdinger babysits his new friend's children, but trouble arises when they start feuding with his kitties.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Popcorn Caf / The Crew Fixes A Slippery Mess - Rubble & Crew switch to cleanup mode when construction on Caf Carl's new popcorn restaurant pops out of control. // A soapy accident causes slippery mayhem all over Builder Cove. Can the pups clean it up in time for Mayor Greatway's big jump?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep526
programme.desc: Madame Gazelle's Leaving Party - The children are sad because their favorite teacher, Madame Gazelle, is leaving daycare. But a leaving party will give her a good send-off.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep512
programme.desc: Peppa and George's Garden - Grandpa Pig pops round with some seeds for Peppa and George. Daddy Pig helps out by being a scarecrow

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep513
programme.desc: The Flying Vet - Doctor Hamster is rushed off her feet when nearly all the animals need her help on the same day.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep514
programme.desc: Kylie Kangeroo - Peppa and George meet Kylie Kangaroo and her brother Joey. Peppa shows Kylie how to jump up and down in muddy puddles, but who can jump the highest?

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep136
programme.desc: The Treasure Hunt - Froga organizes a treasure hunt for her friends! Everyone is enthusiastic, except Ron is not with them. Froga realises the treasure has now disappeared. When the treasure hunters have finally found Ron, they also found him..with the missing treasure!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep138
programme.desc: The Friendship Bouquet - Froga is devastated because her sunflowers have withered in her garden and she cannot make her annual sunflower bouquet. Luckily, Anna, with her friends, searches for a solution to replace Froga's cherished sunflowers with something better!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Joshini The Amazing - Periwinkle is planning a magic show! The Amazing Joshini and YOU, are eager to perform the greatest magic trick the Blue's Clues house has ever seen! But which one? We'll play Blue's Clues to figure itout.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep222
programme.desc: Pups Save a Floundering Francois / Pups Save the Pop-Up Penguins - Capn Turbot and his cousin Francois are whale watching when the Flounder hits a rock and starts to sink! This rescue needs all paws on deck. // Stowaway penguins have scattered around Adventure Bay! Time to call the PAW Patrol!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep515
programme.desc: Pups and the Mystery of the Driverless Snocat - Daring Danny's new remote control accidentally takes control of Everest's SnoCat and all the vehicles in Adventure Bay!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep110
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Pig Barn / The Crew Builds A Giant Runway - A new farmer in town asks Rubble & Crew to build a barn for her pig! But will it be done in time for the big Pig Party? // Motor's super special birthday present gets delayed when the pups realize Builder Cove's airport needs a bigger runway.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Steel Antlers / Berry Bad - Sir Steel dons fake antlers to join the Deer Squad as they plan a surprise birthday party for Tina Turtle. // Sir Steel is infuriated when berries stain his new coat. Deer Squad must stop his mech-feet stamp stompers from destroying the berry bushes.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Paddington and The House Guest / Paddington and The Banana - Mr. Curry is invited by Paddington to stay with the Browns whilst his flooded house is being repaired. He thinks the Browns are too disorganized. // Paddington accidentally takes a banana from the caf without paying for it.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep94
programme.desc: Day Trip - The Teletubbies go on a day trip to the Hidey Hup. They take turns on The Tubby Bouncy, The Tubby Slidey and The Tubby Spinny before they go on The Tubby Uppy Downy together.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S5 Ep19
programme.desc: Feather - Dee encourages a friend to say `feather', and goes on a whirlwind word adventure. They see lots of different types of feathers: a grey feather, a spotty feather, a fluffy feather and a unicorn feather.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Amazing Maze - Hooper builds an amazing fairy tale maze, but his friends get lost in it.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep19
programme.desc: A Night At The Circuits - Messy is exploring science questions. He joins his friends in OKIDO on an adventure. They explore the electrical world of circuits to fix Zoe's communicator.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Topsy Turvy Time - Monty is in a topsy-turvy mood and doing things a little bit differently, leaving him questioning why things always have to be same.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep34
programme.desc: Cafe - In the park, Bluey meets a new playmate named Winnie, but when Bluey wants to invite her and her dad home for breakfast, she learns that adults take a little bit longer to make friends.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep36
programme.desc: The Puppy Badge - Duggee's nephew Dudley comes to stay. He's one cute puppy, but he looks like he could cause chaos in the clubhouse. And wait a minute - what's that terrible smell?

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep35
programme.desc: The Egg Badge - A newly laid egg has trouble hatching and runs off with just its legs poking out, so the squirrels set off to bring it back safely.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep34
programme.desc: The Circus Badge - The Squirrels are excited that a circus has come to town, until they see it is a flea circus. However, they realise it is impressive when they see the acts.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep28
programme.desc: The Aqueduct of Segovia - Cartoon following four adventure-seeking superheroes as they explore exciting places all around the world.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep27
programme.desc: The Stokkur Geyser, Iceland - The Go Jetters are off to see the Geysers in Iceland, but Grandmaster Glitch and the Grimbots have beaten them to it, and managed to get themselves stuck in the Geysers.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep33
programme.desc: Swim School - Mum, Dad, and Bingo must complete both their classes to pass swim school, but pleasing strict Big Fish instructor Margaret (aka Bluey) is proving to be very difficult.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep32
programme.desc: Circus - Bluey is the ringmaster in a game of circus with her friends, but Hercules wants to play his motorcycle game instead. Luckily, Bluey has a solution to keep everyone happy.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Andy and the Shoebill Chick - Andy heads to Southern Africa to discover how shoebill chicks drink water.

programme.title: Catie's Amazing Machines S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Emergency Machines - Rally driver Catie shows off three amazing emergency machines at her track. She drives a fire engine, checks out lots of hover bikes and then drives a police car.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S6 Ep12
programme.desc: Sleepy Shipmates - Cook and Line are being kept awake at night by a noisy snorer. Captain HeyHo insists it isn't her, but later on in the cove the mystery snorer is revealed.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep33
programme.desc: The Tidy Up Badge - A big package arrives for Duggee while he is dusting - an amazing new vacuum cleaner.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep32
programme.desc: The Decorating Badge - The dog is painting the clubhouse and the squirrels ask if they can help, but they have some different colours in mind.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep31
programme.desc: The Snowman Badge - The Squirrels are playing outside in the snow and decide to build a jolly-looking snowman. But when the punky penguins turn up, the fun REALLY begins!

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep26
programme.desc: Big Ben, England - The Go Jetters visit London on New Year's Eve, but Big Ben is missing! To the Vroomster!

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Komodo National Park, Indonesia - When Grandmaster Glitch supersizes a fierce Komodo dragon, the Go Jetters must act fast!

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S15 Ep11
programme.desc: Surprise Surprise - Thomas is certain his friends will be repaired in time for the children's party, but Victor is not so sure. Edward, Percy and Stanley are upset at the thought of missing the party, but Thomas has an idea.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep9
programme.desc: Ribbon Fall - The Ribbon Sisters invite Sarah and Duck to their favourite seasonal event in the park.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep8
programme.desc: Bags of Bags - Scarf Lady has misplaced Bag in the Big Shop, so Sarah & Duck help with the search.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora S1 Ep46
programme.desc: Stormy Seagulls - The seals are sheltering from the storm, but the seagulls are being a bit rude.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Dog Loves Snark - Dog and Pug meet a pirate captain on a desert island who is hunting the Snark. Our friends realise that they should protect the Snark and develop a game of hide and seek.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Coconut Safari Club - Monty is surprised when his family tell him that Jimmy Jones can't appreciate music because he's an animal.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S2 Ep34
programme.desc: It's Time to Remember Grandad - JoJo wants to know more about Grandad, so Gran Gran takes her on an adventure to remember Grandad, by doing all his favourite winter activities.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep59
programme.desc: Tunnel Vision - When an erupting geyser disturbs the rabbits, the team helps them to find a more peaceful home.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep58
programme.desc: Finn Fun - How can Logi-Po join in and play with his pet friend Finn the fish in just the same way that Tinpo plays with his hamster Herman?

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep33
programme.desc: Trampoline - When Dad has to stop having fun with the girls and go to work, Bluey and Bingo scramble to keep him playing games with them on the trampoline!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep30
programme.desc: The We Love Animals Badge - Duggee is stroking Enid the cat. The Squirrels want to find animals they can stroke too.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep29
programme.desc: The Spider Badge - The squirrels are playing in the clubhouse when Norrie discovers a spider in the dressing up box. Everywhere Norrie goes the spider seems to go too. Aarrrggh! That's a bit scary!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep28
programme.desc: The Sheep Badge - The Squirrels are playing with their toys when they notice that there is a sheep in the clubhouse. Wait a minute! There are sheep everywhere! How did that happen?

programme.desc: The Golden Gate Bridge, USA - On a very foggy day, The Golden Gate Bridge's foghorns are missing. Can the Go Jetters help?

Each 30-minute TV edition is hosted by a long-term expatriate in China who has a unique understanding of the countrys culture. He or she will introduce viewers to people who are dedicating their lives to its protection, inheritance, innovation, development and promotion.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Dawson vs. Green
programme.desc: Prelims - Unbeaten for over seven years, Grant Dawsons hot streak has led him a UFC Fight Night main event on October 8 that will shake up the lightweight Top 10 as he faces surging veteran Bobby Green at the APEX in Las Vegas. Showing the best form of his career in his July finish of former champion Tony Ferguson, Green is determined to stop the rapid rise of Dawson and continue his own march to the top at 155 pounds

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Dawson vs. Green
programme.desc: Main Event - Unbeaten for over seven years, Grant Dawsons hot streak has led him a UFC Fight Night main event on October 8 that will shake up the lightweight Top 10 as he faces surging veteran Bobby Green at the APEX in Las Vegas. Showing the best form of his career in his July finish of former champion Tony Ferguson, Green is determined to stop the rapid rise of Dawson and continue his own march to the top at 155 pounds

programme.title: UFC Unleashed
programme.desc: Queens of the Octagon - The UFCs women champions have grown to be some of the biggest stars in the sport. On this episode, weve got a collection of the biggest stars to hold the belt. Featuring Valentina Shevchenko, Nina Nunes, Ronda Rousey, and Rose Namajunas.

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep4
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep14
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep9
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: 2023 Pertamina Grand Prix of Indonesia Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - The MotoGP World Championship crowns one of 22 riders lining up on 1000cc prototype bikes capable of producing over 240 horsepower and getting up to speeds of 350kph over 21 Grand Prix races.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2332
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Yusuff vs. Barboza
programme.desc: Prelims - An elite featherweight talent readying his assault on the Top 10 at 145 pounds, Sodiq Yusuff has one more roadblock in his way in the form of feared striker Edson Barboza, who he meets in the October 14 main event of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. Capable of ending a fight with one punch, kick, elbow or knee, Brazils Barboza is coming off a memorable knockout of Billy Quarantillo in April, and he has similar plans for Yusuff, whose back-to-back wins over Alex Caceres and Don Shainis have him in prime form.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Yusuff vs. Barboza

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep905AdesanyavsVettori2
programme.desc: Undefeated in the UFC at 185 pounds, reigning middleweight champion Israel Adesanya defends his title in a rematch against the The Italian Dream Marvin Vettori at UFC 263. See both men train and prepare to fight for UFC middleweight gold.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC274OliveiravsGaethje
programme.desc: Two titles were on the line at UFC 274 as Charles Oliveira faced off against Justin Gaethje and Rose Namajunas took on Carla Esparza in a rematch of their Ultimate Fighter Finale bout. See the entire main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.
